wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Ernest Leonard Groves (9 October 1921 – May 2002) was an English professional football goalkeeper who played in the Football League for Reading.

response: Mark Wade is "America's Foremost Children's Ventriloquist".Entertainment Experts, http://entertainment-experts.com/developing-school-assembly-programs/  He has performed and lectured internationally on the subject, and was named "Ventriloquist Of The Year" in 1980.Vent Haven Museum, Ft. Mitchell, Ky  He is the Executive Director of the Vent Haven International Ventriloquists' ConVENTion,Vent Haven Convention Website, http://www.venthavenconvention.com/ and is the Executive Director of Maher Ventriloquist Studios,Maher Studios Website, http://www.maherstudios.com the oldest established ventriloquist studio that teaches the art of ventriloquism. Along with Ken Groves and Tom Crowl Mark started the IVS (International Ventriloquist Society) in 2013.IVS Website, http://maherstudios.com/ivs-2/  He also sits on the Board of Advisors for the Vent Haven Ventriloquist Museum, a post he has had for many years.Vent Haven Museum Website, http://venthavenmuseum.com/about/personnel/
